rdf:Description.dc:title: The Story of the Typewriter
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Herkimer County Historical Society

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Typewriter -- History
rdf:Description.dc:description: A short history of the typewriter, complete with numerous pictures of early models, produced on the occasion of its 50th birthday in 1923.
